questions.question: What is the dominant color of the bottle's label, excluding text and smaller design elements?
What is the primary shape of the supplement container?
What material appears to constitute the primary body of the supplement bottle?
Considering the overall texture, is the bottle's surface predominantly smooth or rough?
What color is the cap of the supplement bottle?
What is the overall shape of the supplement contained within the bottle (as visually inferred from the bottle's shape)?
What is the dominant color of the text on the primary label of the bottle?
Is there any noticeable texture to the label itself (e.g., glossy, matte)?
What appears to be the material of the supplement bottle's cap?
What color is the small circular logo near the bottom of the label?
Describe the visual style of the text font on the label (e.g., serif, sans-serif)?
Is the label design primarily characterized by simplicity or complexity in terms of visual elements?
Based on the image, what type of closure does the bottle use?
Does the label include any visible images or illustrations besides text and the logo?
What is the general condition of the product shown (e.g., new, used, damaged)?
